html:
flow together. Those of Zion will come in unity, as waters join in one when they flow together.

thine heart shall fear, and be enlarged. An alternate reading from other versions is helpful: "Your heart shall thrill" (RSV) and "swell with joy" (NIV; Jer. 33:9; Hosea 3:5).

abundance of the sea. This phrase indicates that the riches of the seafaring nations will be brought to Zion. Moreover, Jesus compared the kingdom of heaven to a net cast into the sea, which then drew forth many fishes (Matt. 13:47-48). In this symbolism, the sea is the earth, and the fishes are those brought into the Lord's kingdom, or the abundance of the sea.

forces of the Gentiles. The riches or wealth or power of the nations will come to strengthen Zion (60:11). A multitude of souls from the nations will come.
